record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, MAY 7, 2007, AT 2:15 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I know of no further business to come before the Senate today, so I thank the Chair for presiding and I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 10:21 a.m., adjourned until Monday, May 7, 2007, at 2:15 p.m.
